Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: MitoQ , a mitochondrial - targeted antioxidant , was shown to completely prevent these mitochondrial abnormalities as well as cardiac dysfunction characterized here by a diastolic dysfunction studied with a conductance catheter to obtain pressure - volume data .

| --- |
| diastolic dysfunction |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the only disease entity mentioned is "diastolic dysfunction". This term is used to describe a type of cardiac dysfunction, which is characterized by the inability of the heart's lower chambers to fill properly with blood during the diastolic phase of the heartbeat. Therefore, the term "diastolic dysfunction" is identified as the disease entity in this paragraph.

The term "cardiac dysfunction" is also not a specific disease entity, but rather a general term used to describe any abnormal functioning of the heart.
